description:
Wien (German for Vienna) is the new transfer student from Austria, where he lived for twelve years. Due to his time away, he is very unfamiliar with Japanese customs, and had thus consulted books on the proper mannerisms, often to humorous results when he misuses certain gestures, including performing a dogeza when introducing himself on the first day. He is in the same after-school class as Wakana. He often write a letter for someone he calls http://anidb.net/ch47425 [Yang].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Wien
